dcterms:creator: A. Schein
J. Paisley
D. M. Blei
H. Wallach
dcterms:description: The Integrated Conflict Early Warning System (ICEWS) dataset records dyadic events between different countries, capturing interactions over several years. It is used to analyze generalization abilities to new facts and validate hypotheses related to episodic memory.
dcterms:title: Integrated Conflict Early Warning System (ICEWS)

dcterms:creator: M. D. Ward
A. Beger
J. Cutler
M. Dickenson
C. Dorff
B. Radford
dcterms:description: The Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone (GDELT) monitors news media from around the world, providing a large episodic dataset that captures events daily since January 1, 1979. It is used to analyze generalization abilities and episodic information retrieval.
dcterms:title: Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone (GDELT)
